entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
